column2: Clones with 500–800 repeats, and no retracted band present
column3: Heterogeneous clones with 500–800 repeats, plus repeat at or close to WT size (estimated < 50)
column4: Heterogeneous clones with 300–500 repeats, plus repeat at or close to WT size (estimated < 50)
column5: Clones only with repeat at or close to WT size (estimated < 50)
